date.description: If `type` is `"exact"`, `date` will be the expected delivery date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

earliest.description: If `type` is `"range"`, `earliest` will be be the earliest delivery date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

latest.description: If `type` is `"range"`, `latest` will be the latest delivery date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

type.description: The type of estimate. Must be either `"range"` or `"exact"`.
